text: Corallo is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Anthony Corallo (1913–2000), Italian-American mobster * Mark Corallo (21st century), political communications and public relations professional * Riccardo Corallo (born 1980), Italian footballer * Salvatore Corallo (1928–2019), Italian politician ==See also== * Coralli * Corallo (submarine)
title: Corallo
